2637e8b6-8444-4291-8087-9c551889dc8a.description: Earners of the Team Performer Advanced Credential hold a mindset that wants to see Telstra succeed. They plan and proactively respond to changed priorities while building a diverse team with strong, inclusive relationships between team members. Earners leverage strengths of each team member to deliver high performance, coaching and supporting others to achieve their maximum potential. Earners have sourced education on how to build an inclusive and high performing teams.

1681df29-820f-45af-a66d-b5950b931bb3.description: Earners of the Leads the Way Advanced Credential hold a mindset that motivates others to an agreed purpose.
